title: Red Flag Or Not? Her Sister's Husband Constantly Makes *This* Disturbing Joke
description:
Her sister's husband of over 20 years likes to joke with her often. Originally she thought the jokes he made were lighthearted. But she quickly found out they are more morbid. Is this a red flag?
